div.p: My name is Laura Antonson and I am the Manager of the DeSales Campus Store.
The Center Valley Campus Store is located in the University Center, across from Dooling.
We also have store located at the Easton Campus,
and that is open at the beginning of each semester.
We supply all of your course materials, as well as a large section of imprinted and gift items.
Textbooks for your upcoming semesters are available approximately two weeks before your
Easton books will be available at the Center Valley campus, online, and at the Easton camps.
All Center Valley books and online books must be purchased at the Center Valley campus or online.
When sleecting yorucourse materials, please purchase your materials only for the course
that your are currently enrolled in in the updcoming semester.
For an exmpalke if you are in enrolled in the Easton Campus for Session 2 in English 103,
do not purchase the books for EN103, Session 1 for the Center Valley Campus.
